typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Code_segment as string,
		Poste_segment as string,
		Id_transaction as string,
		Num_serie as string,
		Id_entreprise as string,
		Id_paiement as string,
		Code_moyen_paiement as string,
		Sens_paiement as string,
		Montant as double,
		Type_equipement as integer,
		Date_ope as timestamp,
		Name as string,
		Guid as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source1 split(ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
	ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
	disjoint: true) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(, , )
